sentences.sentence: He was homeless, so we took him in.
sentences.translation: 他无家可归，我们便收留了他。

sentences.sentence: This project is designed to help homeless people.
sentences.translation: 这个项目旨在帮助无家可归的人。

sentences.sentence: The scheme has been set up to help homeless people.
sentences.translation: 这个计划的目的是帮助无家可归的人。
